entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
